title: Fan Art For RP

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I need 22 RP to buy a 975 Skin.. So I made this Twitch skin in protest of the new Splash Art for Gangster Twitch as well as for the possibility  of the 22 RP. {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}}

replies.body: Email Riot Support with this and they will help you out :D

+1. 

Also the cheese is a great touch here
